column8: A highlight of using The Philanthropy Project was that I got to have a template and it told me exactly what to put in there. The website also gave me questions to answer which made me think about my Exhibition and how it influences me and other people around me.
column9: A significant moment for me was when I got to submit campaign. As soon as I submitted the campaign, I felt that I was helping the community learn about the importance of gender equality. I also felt that many people would be inspired to fight for Women's Rights.
column10: I was surprised because the questions were pretty deep and it helped me think about my project more. It also helped me learn more about the real significance about how people might interpret my campaign and if I was doing it by myself, it might have turned out differently.
column13: I will remember using this website and how it further helped me with my project. When fundraising in the future, I will think of using this website to help me with fundraising events and programs.
column14: I learned about types of questions I should think about when working on projects.
column16: I would want someone to ask me what I got from this experience and how it influenced me to work harder.
